sql.query: select rgc.application_id, rgc.axis_set_id, rgc.axis_seq, rgc.SEGMENT1_LOW, rgc.SEGMENT1_HIGH, rgc.SEGMENT2_LOW, rgc.SEGMENT2_HIGH, rgc.SEGMENT3_LOW, rgc.SEGMENT3_HIGH, rgc.SEGMENT4_LOW, rgc.SEGMENT4_HIGH, rgc.SEGMENT5_LOW, rgc.SEGMENT5_HIGH, cc.code_combination_id, cc.segment1, cc.segment2, cc.segment3, cc.segment4, cc.segment5 FROM RG_REPORT_AXIS_CONTENTS rgc, GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS cc WHERE 1=1 AND cc.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID = 101 AND rgc.axis_set_id = 1000 AND cc.SEGMENT1 >= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT1_LOW, cc.SEGMENT1) AND cc.SEGMENT1 <= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT1_HIGH, cc.SEGMENT1) AND cc.SEGMENT2 >= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT2_LOW, cc.SEGMENT2) AND cc.SEGMENT2 <= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT2_HIGH, cc.SEGMENT2) AND cc.SEGMENT3 >= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT3_LOW, cc.SEGMENT3) AND cc.SEGMENT3 <= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT3_HIGH, cc.SEGMENT3) AND cc.SEGMENT4 >= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT4_LOW, cc.SEGMENT4) AND cc.SEGMENT4 <= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT4_HIGH, cc.SEGMENT4) AND cc.SEGMENT5 >= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT5_LOW, cc.SEGMENT5) AND cc.SEGMENT5 <= nvl(rgc.SEGMENT5_HIGH, cc.SEGMENT5)
